traits: reloading with lmgs is reduced to a minor action

traits: ignore perception debuffs from weather effects

and become immune to toxic gas

traits: gain darkvision but suffer -2 on perception checks that rely on sight

traits: see invisible enemies but suffer -3 on perception checks that rely on sight
